backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and state for menu items, orders, bookings, users, and Stripe config with authorization mixin and basic query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to the admin-status-refresh feature with metadata and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, hooks, mutations, UI components, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom light/dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell containing a root div and script entry point for the React app.
frontend/README.md: Frontend overview explaining features, payment setup via Razorpay, tech stack, and setup instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing structure with layout, protected routes, admin routes, and providers.
frontend/src/cart/CartProvider.tsx: React context managing cart state with localStorage persistence and item/quantity operations.
frontend/src/cart/cartStorage.ts: Serialization helpers converting BigInt fields in the cart to and from JSON-safe formats.
frontend/src/components/admin/DevResetSe: Placeholder admin component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/admin/KpiCard.ts: UI component rendering a KPI card with title, value, icon, and optional description.
frontend/src/components/admin/RequireAdm: Route guard that checks admin status and shows an access-denied screen for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with post-login query invalidation for admin and profile data.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save profile details before continuing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper enforcing authentication and showing a login prompt when the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Badge component that displays a booking's status label and style based on its variant.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: App footer with branding, navigation links, social icons, and a Caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Navbar.ts: Responsive top navigation bar showing links, cart count, admin options, and login controls.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Card displaying a menu item's details, availability, price, and add‑to‑cart option.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuSkeleto: Skeleton grid placeholder shown while menu items are loading.
frontend/src/components/orders/OrderStat: Badge component that shows an order's status with appropriate labeling and variant styling.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Dialog prompting admins to configure Razorpay secret key and allowed countries when unconfigured.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useBookingA: React Query mutation for admins to update booking status and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useMenuAdmi: Provides React Query mutations for adding, updating, and deleting menu items using the actor and invalidates related menu queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useOrderAdm: Defines a mutation to update an order's status and refreshes dashboard and order-related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/payments/useCreateChe: Creates a checkout session via the actor using provided shopping items and returns the Stripe session data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and provides an authenticated or anonymous actor, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthRedirect.ts: Manages storing and restoring intended routes in session storage to redirect users after authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and related states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines various React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, menu items, orders, and bookings through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing KPI metrics and allowing order and booking status updates using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MenuAdminPage.t: Menu administration UI that lists items and supports adding, editing, and deleting menu entries via dialog forms.
frontend/src/pages/BookChefPage.tsx: Implements a form page for creating chef booking requests using the actor and navigates to bookings after submission.
frontend/src/pages/BookingsPage.tsx: Displays the user's bookings, handling loading, empty state, sorting, and detailed booking info with status badges.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Manages the shopping cart UI and checkout flow, including validation, order creation, and Stripe session initiation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the marketing homepage with a hero section, feature cards, and navigation to menu and chef booking.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Shows all available menu items with category tabs, handles loading and error states, and supports adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays the user's past orders with sorting, status badges, item details, and totals.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a failure message after payment errors with navigation options back to cart or menu.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes Stripe session results, updates order payment status, and displays a success message with navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted URL/session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current architecture, requirements, known issues, and feature versions.
